crown.name: CSK_MultiIOLinkSMI
crown.desc: This CSK module provides an easy access to IOLink functionality of AppSpace controller. + It is highly recommended to use this module along with the following CSK modules: + - CSK_1stModule_Logger - for logging data processing issues + - CSK_Module_IODDInterpreter - for easy combining of read/write messages to be received/sent from/to IOLink device + - CSK_Module_PersistentData - to save configured read/write messages as well as process data structure if it is variable + - CSK_Module_PowerManager - to power the necessary IOLink ports + --- + The main externally useful features are following: + ** 1. Generic CSK functionality: + ** Each instance is handled in a separate thread. Useful Instance functions: + - "addInstance" - to create a new instance + - "setSelectedInstance" - to select instance you are working on + ** 2. Port handling + ** - "setPort" - to set port used by the instance + - "activateInstance" - to start/stop IOLink functionality for the selected port + - event "OnNewPortEvent" - notifies new IOLink port event + ** 3. Connected IOLink device identification handling + ** If the device's process data structure is variable, the module makes sure that the saved structure option is applied at the device after reboot/reconnection. + - "getDeviceIdentification" - to get identification table of connected device + - "applyNewDeviceIdentification" - to start using a newly connected device instead of saved one + - event "OnNewDeviceIdentificationApplied" - to notify external apps that new identification is applied + ** 4. Read and write messages handling + ** Messages to be read or written from/to device are sets of data combined based on selection in respective dynamic tables in UI. + Each message has its own IODD instance at the background. + After message configuration, the JSON template is available in UI for reference. + The structure of the write message must comply with the generated JSON template. + Each read message has its own event to register to exteranlly. + The event name is **"CSK_MultiIOLinkSMI.readMessage" .. port .. readMessageName** + Each write message has its own function to be called externally. + The function name is **"CSK_MultiIOLinkSMI.writeMessage" .. port .. writeMessageName** + Use following functions to handle messages: + - "createIoddReadMessage" and "createIoddWriteMessage" + - "setSelectedIoddReadMessage" and "setSelectedIoddWriteMessage" + - "setIoddReadMessageName" and "setIoddWriteMessageName" + - "deleteIoddReadMessage" and "deleteIoddWriteMessage" + ** 5. Direct data reading/writing + ** The following functions can be used for reading or writing data by selected instance directly: + - "readProcessData" and "writeProcessData" - to read/write process data using IODD interpretation at the background + - "readParameter" and "writeParameter" - to read/write parameters using IODD interpretation at the background + - "readProcessDataByteArray" and "writeProcessDataByteArray" - to read/write row byte arrays of process data (no IODD needed) + - "readParameterByteArray" and "writeParameterByteArray" - to read/write row byte arrays of parameter (no IODD needed) + - "readIoddMessage" and "writeIoddMessage" - to read/write preconfigured messages + --- + ** ToDo: + ** - Data Storage support to save set of all parameters to be applied on controller reboot or device reconnection

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app-/device- boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of PersistendData CSK module are available.

event.name: OnNewInstanceList
event.desc: Event to provide list of created instances

event.name: OnNewProcessingParameter
event.desc: Event to share processing parameters to the instances.

param.desc: Number of the instance to receive the parameter
param.name: objectNo

param.desc: If parameter is for specifici internal used object, its nnumber
param.name: internalObjectNo

event.name: OnNewSelectedInstance
event.desc: Notify if new instance is selected.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewResultNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide result of instance. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1") + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewValueUpdateNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to sync paramters between instance threads and Controller part of app. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1") +

param.desc: Instance new value is coming from.
param.name: instance

param.desc: Name of the paramter to update/sync
param.name: parameter

param.desc: Optionally if internal parameter should be used for internal objects.
param.name: selectedObject

event.name: OnNewValueToForwardNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to forward data from instance thread to Controler app, e.g. to forward values to UI. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1")+

param.desc: Eventname to use to forward value.
param.name: eventname

event.name: OnNewPort
event.desc: Event to show selected IOLink port in UI.

event.name: isInstanceActive
event.desc: Notify if instance is activated.

event.name: OnNewPortDropdown
event.desc: Event to show list of ports in UI.

event.name: OnNewReadJSONTemplate
event.desc: Event to show JSON template of configured reading message.

event.name: OnNewWriteJSONTemplate
event.desc: Event to show JSON template of configured write message.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

event.name: OnNewVendorName
event.desc: Event to show the vendor name of connected IOLink device.

event.name: OnNewVendorText
event.desc: Event to show the vendor text of connected IOLink device.

event.name: OnNewVendorId
event.desc: Event to show the vendor ID of connected IOLink device.

event.name: OnNewProductName
event.desc: Event to show the product name of connected IOLink device.

event.name: OnNewProductText
event.desc: Event to show the product text of connected IOLink device.

event.name: OnNewProductId
event.desc: Event to show the product id of connected IOLink device.

event.name: OnNewSerialNumber
event.desc: Event to show the serial number of connected IOLink device.

event.name: OnNewHardwareVersion
event.desc: Event to show the hardware version of the device.

event.name: OnNewFirmwareVersion
event.desc: Event to show the firmware version of the device.

event.name: OnNewPortEvent
event.desc: Event to show the new status of active IOLink port. Can be used externally.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceFirmwareVersion
event.desc: Event to show the firmware version of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceHardwareVersion
event.desc: Event to show the hardware version of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceSerialNumber
event.desc: Event to show the serial number of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceVendorId
event.desc: Event to show the vendor ID of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceProductId
event.desc: Event to show the product id of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceProductName
event.desc: Event to show the product name of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceProductText
event.desc: Event to show the product text of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceVendorName
event.desc: Event to show the vendor name of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewNewDeviceVendorText
event.desc: Event to show the vendor text of new discovered device.

event.name: OnNewListProcessDataCondition
event.desc: Event to provide list of process data structure options.

param.desc: List of process data structure options.
param.name: jsonListProcessDataCondition

event.name: OnNewProcessDataCondition
event.desc: Event to show selected IOLink procecss data option of connected device in UI.

param.desc: Selected variant of process data structure.
param.name: condition

event.name: OnNewPortStatus
event.desc: Event to show current port status of selected IOLink port in UI.

event.name: IsNewDeviceFound
event.desc: Event to notify if there is a new device discovered on selected port. Used to show settings in UI.

event.name: OnNewSelectedTab
event.desc: Notify to show selected tab.

event.name: OnNewSelectedIoddReadMessage
event.desc: Event to show selected read message.

event.name: OnNewSelectedIoddWriteMessage
event.desc: Event to show selected write message.

event.name: OnNewListIoddReadMessages
event.desc: Event to provide list of created read messages.

event.name: OnNewListIoddWriteMessages
event.desc: Event to provide list of created write messages.

event.name: OnNewTriggerType
event.desc: Event to show the selected trigger type of selected read message.

event.name: OnNewTriggerValue
event.desc: Event to show the selected trigger value of selected read message.

param.desc: Period in [ms] or name of CROWN event.
param.name: triggerValue

event.name: OnNewIOLinkPortStatus
event.desc: Notify new status of the IOLink port.

event.name: OnNewReadDataSuccess
event.desc: Event to show the success of reading message after the refresh button has been pressed in UI.

event.name: OnNewWriteDataSuccess
event.desc: Event to show the latest success of writing message to IOLink device after refresh button has been pressed.

event.name: OnNewWriteDataMessage
event.desc: Event to show the latest payload of write message sent to IOLink device after refresh button has been pressed.

event.name: OnNewReadDataMessage
event.desc: Event to show the received message after the refresh button has been pressed in UI.

event.name: OnNewReadProcessDataByteArray
event.desc: Event to show the received byte array after reading the process data from IOLink device for testing purposes.

event.name: OnNewReadParameterByteArray
event.desc: Event to show the received byte array after reading the configured parameter from IOLink device for testing purposes.

event.name: OnNewTestCommandState
event.desc: Event to show latest status of reading or writing raw byte arrays from/to IOLink device for testing purpuses.

event.name: OnNewDeviceIdentificationApplied
event.desc: Notify if device identification of new discovered device is applied instead of the old one.

param.desc: JSON object containing all parameters of the instance.
param.name: jsonInstanceParameters

event.name: isIoddReadMessageSelected
event.desc: Event to inform if the read message is selected in UI. Used to show settings in UI.

event.name: isIoddWriteMessageSelected
event.desc: Event to inform if the write message is selected in UI. Used to show settings in UI.

event.name: OnNewTestWriteIoddMessage
event.desc: Event to show the edited JSON payload of write message be sent to IOLink device for testing purposes.

param.desc: JSON payload which must have the same structure as JSON template of configured write message.
param.name: testWriteIoddMessage

event.name: isCskIoddInterpreterAvailable
event.desc: Event to show if there is available CSK IODD interpreter in the project.

event.name: isIoddMatchFound
event.desc: Event to notify if there is a matching IODD file found by IODD interpreter module.

param.desc: True if the match is found.
param.name: isFound

event.name: OnNewReadMessageEventName
event.desc: Event to show the event name that can be used externally.

event.name: OnNewWriteMessageFunctionName
event.desc: Event to notify the name of the write data function that can be used externally.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the "PersistentData" CSK-module

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to PersistentData CSK module if possible to save them

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the PersistentData CSK-module if possible and use them

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app- / device- boot up

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: setSelectedInstance
function.desc: Select one of the multiple instances.

function.name: getInstancesAmount
function.desc: Get the amount of created instances of this module

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Function to add an additional instance.

function.name: resetInstances
function.desc: Function to reset instances to one single instance. IMPORTANT: As instances start their own threads, the module needs to be restarted if new instances are needed... (see AppEngine docu for "Script.startScript")

function.name: activateInstance
function.desc: Activate or deactivate the instance.

function.name: setPort
function.desc: Set an IOLink port for selected instance.

function.name: getInstanceParameters
function.desc: Get all parameters of the instance

function.name: updateInstanceParameters
function.desc: Update all parameters of specified instance. Following is sample structure of JSON table with parameters: + ``` json { "active":false, "periodDuration":1000, "port":"S1", "ReadPD": [ { "DataInfo":"DT50_distance", "DataType":"UINT", "StartBit":0, "BitLength":16, "Period":1, }, ], "WritePD":[], "ReadSD": [ { "DataInfo":"DT50_process_data_structure", "DataType":"UINT", "Index":120 "Subindex":0, "Period":3, }, { "DataInfo":"DT50_sensor_temperature", "DataType":"INT", "Index":153 "Subindex":0, "Period":3, } ], "WriteSD": [ { "DataInfo":"DT50_process_data_structure" "DataType":"UINT", "DataLength":1, "Index":120, "Subindex":0, "Period":0, } ] } ```

function.name: handleOnNewPortEvent
function.desc: Internally used function triggered when the new event occurs in IOLink port.

param.desc: Event code as described within IO-Link Interface specification annex C.
param.name: eventCode

function.name: getDeviceIdentification
function.desc: Get identification of a device connected to a specified port. The identification contains the following parameters: *statusInfo - status of the IOLink port *deviceId *vendorId *vendorText *productName *productText *serialNumber *hardwareVersion *firmwareVersion

function.name: applyNewDeviceIdentificationUI
function.desc: Delete settings for previous device and continue with new discovered device. Triggered by UI button.

function.name: setProcessDataCondition
function.desc: Set process data structure varient if the structure is variable. The respective value will be sent to the parameter responsible for the structure.

param.desc: New condition string parced based on IODD file content.
param.name: newCondition

function.name: writeParameter
function.desc: Write parameter to IOLink sensor in case the IODD description of the parameter is available.

param.desc: JSON object with data to write to the IOLink device.
param.name: jsonDataToWrite

function.name: readParameter
function.desc: Read parameter of IOLink sensor in case the IODD description of the parameter is available.

return.desc: Received data converted using IODD interpretation.
return.name: readResult

function.name: setSelectedTab
function.desc: Select tab in UI.

function.name: createIoddReadMessage
function.desc: Create a new data set to read from device with the help of IODD interpreter.

function.name: createIoddWriteMessage
function.desc: Create a new data set to write to device with the help of IODD interpreter.

function.name: deleteIoddReadMessage
function.desc: Delete created data set.

function.name: deleteIoddWriteMessage
function.desc: Delete created data set.

function.name: setSelectedIoddReadMessage
function.desc: Select a read message to edit.

function.name: setSelectedIoddWriteMessage
function.desc: Select a write message to edit.

function.name: setIoddReadMessageName
function.desc: Set title of the message to read from IOLink device.

function.name: setIoddWriteMessageName
function.desc: Set title of the message to write to IOLink device.

function.name: setTriggerType
function.desc: Set condition of when to read the selected read message. Possible options: *Periodic - the message is periodically requested from the IOLink device. The period can be set by setTriggerValue function. *On event- the message is requested from the IOLink device when some event is notified. The event can be set by setTriggerValue function.

function.name: setTriggerValue
function.desc: Set value depending on the selected trigger type of the selected read message. *if type is 'Periodic' - period in [ms]. *if type is 'On event' - name of served CROWN event.

param.desc: Period in [ms] or name of served CROWN event.
param.name: newTriggerValue

function.name: applyNewDeviceIdentification
function.desc: Set device identification of a new device.

param.desc: Json table containing the device identification.
param.name: jsonNewDeviceIdentification

function.name: makeDefaultInstance
function.desc: Set all instance parameters to default values.

function.name: refreshWriteDataResult
function.desc: Function to show the latest write result of the selected message in UI.

function.name: refreshReadDataResult
function.desc: Function to show the latest read result of the selected message in UI.

function.name: setProcessDataByteArrayToWrite
function.desc: Set byte array to write to the process data of the device for testing purposes in UI.

param.desc: Byte array in dec format where bytes are separated by comma. E.g. 1,12,123
param.name: processDataByteArray

function.name: setTestReadParameterIndex
function.desc: Set index of the parameter to read as byte array in UI.

function.name: setTestReadParameterSubindex
function.desc: Set subindex of the parameter to read as byte array in UI.

function.name: setTestWriteParameterIndex
function.desc: Set index of the parameter to write as byte array in UI.

function.name: setTestWriteParameterSubindex
function.desc: Set subindex of the parameter to write as byte array in UI.

function.name: setParameterByteArrayToWrite
function.desc: Set byte array to write to the parameter of the device for testing purposes in UI.

param.desc: Byte array in dec format where bytes are separated by comma. E.g. 1,12,123
param.name: byteArrayToWrite

function.name: readParameterByteArrayUI
function.desc: Read parameter of IOLink sensor as a raw byte array to show it in UI.

function.name: readProcessDataByteArray
function.desc: Read process data of IOLink sensor as a raw byte array. Might be useful for testing. If reading failed, returns nil.

return.desc: Received byte array in dec format.
return.name: resultByteArray

function.name: writeProcessDataByteArray
function.desc: Write process data to IOLink sensor as a raw byte array. Might be useful for testing.

return.desc: Optional error description if writing failed.
return.name: errorDescription

function.name: writeParameterByteArray
function.desc: Write parameter to IOLink sensor as a raw byte array. Might be useful for testing.

return.desc: Optional error description if writing failed.
return.name: errorDescription

function.name: setTestWriteIoddMessage
function.desc: Set JSON content of message to write to device. The content must have the same format as JSON template of the selected message (template is generated based on selected paramters/process data).

param.desc: JSON data to write to the device.
param.name: newTestWriteIoddMessage

function.name: writeIoddMessageFromUI
function.desc: Write configured message to IOLink sensor from UI.

function.name: writeIoddMessage
function.desc: Write configured message to IOLink sensor.

param.desc: Data to write to the IOLink device in JSON format.
param.name: jsonDataToWrite

function.name: readIoddMessage
function.desc: Read configured message from IOLink sensor.

function.name: readIoddMessageUI
function.desc: Read configured message from IOLink sensor from UI.

function.name: readParameterByteArray
function.desc: Read parameter of IOLink sensor as a raw byte array. Might be useful for testing. If reading failed, returns nil.

return.desc: Received byte array in dec format.
return.name: resultByteArray

function.name: readProcessDataByteArrayUI
function.desc: Read process data of IOLink sensor as a raw byte array to show it in UI.

function.name: writeParameterByteArrayUI
function.desc: Write parameter to IOLink device as a raw byte array triggered by button in UI.

function.name: readProcessData
function.desc: Read parameter of IOLink sensor in case the IODD description of the parameter is available.

function.name: writeProcessData
function.desc: Write process data to IOLink sensor in case the IODD description of the parameter is available.

param.desc: JSON object with data to write to the IOLink device.
param.name: jsonDataToWrite
